name: ZENO's TURTLE
description:
You are Achilles, the famous Greek hero... and you are racing a tortoise. Except in the original Zeno's Paradox, the difficulties were in the definition of movement and speed, and here... Let's just say that the controls are OUT. OF. CONTROL.

You are given three buttons, which change their behavior every single turn. Only one of the three will bring you closer to the finish. The turtle moves slower than you ('cause you are goddamn Achilles), but, unlike you... IT (almost) NEVER STOPS.

GOOD LUCK (you'll need it!)

Made almost entirely by Kirill Emelin (floatingisles)
